title: Causes and Effects of American Revolution

vocab.definition: A complete change in government, often involving fighting
Being forced to pay taxes without having a say in government
Freedom from being controlled by another country
Someone who supported American independence from Britain

teachingNotes: Use timeline activities and cause-and-effect charts. Discuss concepts of fairness and representation. Connect to modern democratic principles.
